variableDataArray.name: semi.Ec_bnd_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Conduction band energy level at boundary, upside

variableDataArray.name: semi.Ec_bnd_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Conduction band energy level at boundary, downside

variableDataArray.name: semi.Ev_bnd_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Valence band energy level at boundary, upside

variableDataArray.name: semi.Ev_bnd_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Valence band energy level at boundary, downside

variableDataArray.name: semi.nQFCn
variableDataArray.formula: e_const * (-semi.Dn_down * semi.Dn_up * (semi.delta_n * down(semi.N) - up(semi.N)) / (semi.dc_up * semi.Dn_down + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_n * semi.Dn_up) + 0.5 * (semi.dc_down * semi.delta_n * semi.Dn_up * (2 * semi.dc_up * semi.Dn_down * down(semi.N) + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_n * semi.Dn_up * down(semi.N) + semi.dc_down * semi.Dn_up * up(semi.N)) * semi.Vn_down + semi.dc_up * semi.Dn_down * (semi.dc_up * semi.delta_n * semi.Dn_down * down(semi.N) + semi.dc_up * semi.Dn_down * up(semi.N)+2 *semi.dc_down * semi.delta_n * semi.Dn_up * up(semi.N)) * semi.Vn_up) / (semi.dc_up*semi.Dn_down+semi.dc_down*semi.delta_n*semi.Dn_up)^2)

variableDataArray.name: semi.nQFSGp
variableDataArray.formula: e_const * semi.Vp_down * ( semi.Ap * semi.delta_p * down( semi.P ) - semi.Bp * up( semi.P ) ) / ((-1+semi.Ap) * semi.delta_p + (1-semi.Bp) * semi.Vp_down / semi.Vp_up)

variableDataArray.name: semi.nQFCp
variableDataArray.formula: e_const * (semi.Dp_down * semi.Dp_up * ( semi.delta_p * down(semi.P) - up(semi.P)) / (semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_up) + 0.5 * (semi.dc_down * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_up * ( 2 * semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down * down(semi.P) + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_up * down(semi.P) + semi.dc_down*semi.Dp_up * up(semi.P)) * semi.Vp_down + semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down * ( semi.dc_up * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_down * down(semi.P) + semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down * up(semi.P) + 2 * semi.dc_down  * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_up * up(semi.P)) * semi.Vp_up ) / (semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_up)^2 )

variableDataArray.name: semi.nQFdSG
variableDataArray.formula: (-semi.Bn * up(semi.N) + semi.An * ( (1 - semi.Bn ) * semi.Vn_down * down(semi.N) / semi.Vn_up + semi.Bn*up(semi.N) ) ) / ( ( -1 + semi.An ) * semi.delta_n + ( 1 - semi.Bn ) * semi.Vn_down / semi.Vn_up)

variableDataArray.name: semi.pQFdSG
variableDataArray.formula: (-semi.Bp * up(semi.P) + semi.Ap * ((1- semi.Bp ) * semi.Vp_down * down(semi.P) / semi.Vp_up + semi.Bp * up(semi.P))) / ( ( -1 + semi.Ap ) * semi.delta_p + ( 1 - semi.Bp ) * semi.Vp_down / semi.Vp_up )

variableDataArray.name: semi.nQFdC
variableDataArray.formula: (semi.dc_up * semi.Dn_down * down(semi.N) + semi.dc_down * semi.Dn_up * up(semi.N)) / (semi.dc_up * semi.Dn_down + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_n * semi.Dn_up)

variableDataArray.name: semi.pQFdC
variableDataArray.formula: (semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down * down(semi.P) + semi.dc_down * semi.Dp_up * up(semi.P)) / (semi.dc_up * semi.Dp_down + semi.dc_down * semi.delta_p * semi.Dp_up)

variableDataArray.name: semi.gamma_n_bnd_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Electron degeneracy factor at boundary, downside

variableDataArray.name: semi.gamma_n_bnd_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Electron degeneracy factor at boundary, upside

variableDataArray.name: semi.gamma_p_bnd_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Hole degeneracy factor at boundary, downside

variableDataArray.name: semi.gamma_p_bnd_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Hole degeneracy factor at boundary, upside
